index.title: BotEnSky Node.js BlueSky Bot
principles.besplantnet.head: the robot answers to some posts that embeds a flower image !
principles.besplantnet.body:
At certain times of the day, the robot searches for images of flowers/plants.

 Then it tries to identify the plant, and if successful, it answers the author of the post with an example image.
principles.besaskplantnet.head: the robot answers to certain mentions to identify plant/flower!
principles.besaskplantnet.body:
It is possible to ask the robot to identify a flower/plant. To do this, answer a post containing an image of a flower/plant with the mention @botensky.bsky.social.
Then you must wait for the robot to wake up for the AskPlantnet plugin (see FAQ)
principles.besbioclip.head: the robot answers to some posts that embeds a bird image !
principles.besbioclip.body:
At certain times of the day, the robot searches for bird images.
 Then it tries to classify the species, and if successful, answers the author of the post with a link to a photo gallery (Avibase).
principles.besaskbioclip.head: the robot responds to certain mentions to identify birds!
principles.besaskbioclip.body:
It is possible to ask the robot to identify a bird.
To do this, reply to a post containing a bird image with the mention AskBioclip.
Then you must wait for the robot to wake up for the AskBioclip plugin (see FAQ)
principles.onedayonebioclip.head: the robot identifies a bird daily with OneDayOneBioclip!
principles.onedayonebioclip.body:
Every day, the robot searches Unsplash for a bird photo and attempts to identify it using Bioclip.
The details of the photo and its identification are then posted on Bluesky for everyone to see and enjoy.
project.line1: BotEnSky is an open-source project that tries to identify plants or flowers (click on the black GitHub corner).
project.line2: It's a young bot, but it learns from its mistakes.
project.line3: The project is open to tinkerers who want to improve the bot.
project.line4: A web designer could bring a lot for example...
project.line5: If someone is working on it, then it is possible that the bot posts more often or strangely.
project.line6: You want to talk about the bot and its features somewhere other than BlueSky, open a discussion.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.head2: What time do you wake up?
faq.body2: For the moment the scheduled shots are 08:30, 11:30, 14:30, 16:30, 17:30, 20:30 (FR). Exact time is not guaranteed by the planner.
faq.body2a: For the PlantNet plugin: I practice at the time of the shot.
faq.body2b: For the AskPlantnet plugin: I practice 10 min after the time of the shot.
faq.body2c: For the BioClip plugin (in test phase): I practice 20 min after the time of the shot.
faq.body2d: For the AskBioClip plugin: I practice 30 min after the time of the shot.
server.error.unavailable: I am currently under maintenance, please try again later
server.error.internal: an internal error has occurred, the team will be notified, try again in a few days or check the tickets
server.error.tooManyRequests: Request too close together, please try again later
server.pleaseReportIssue: please look for or report it on
project.title: Project
